Method.Source: [Hookable(false)] internal static boolean existAutoChargesTransaction(TableId _tableId, RecId _recId) { return _tableId && _recId && (select firstonly RecId from markupTrans index hint TableRecIdIdx where markupTrans.TransTableId == _tableId && markupTrans.TransRecId == _recId && markupTrans.IsAutoCharge == NoYes::Yes && !markupTrans.IsDeleted).RecId != 0; }
